import React, { useState } from 'react' import { UilSearch,UilMapMarker} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' function SearchBar({setCity,unit,setUnit}) { const [inputcity,setInputcity ] = useState('') return (
setCity(e.currentTarget.value)} className='text-xl font-light p-1 shadow-xl focus:outline-none capitalize' placeholder='search cities...' />

|

) } export default SearchBar
